div1.p: Hench thanks Castro for the reference to the publication on Las Animas Hospital.

div1.head: Letter from [Philip Showalter Hench] to Juan D. Castro, October 21, 1940
div1.opener:
Las Animas but
3/6/41 - Male Post
October 21, 1940
Dr. Juan D. Castro
Las Animas Hospital
Havana, Cuba
My dear Doctor Castro:
div1.p:
In connection with my address to be given next
Saturday, at the dedication of the Lazear Memorial, I have had
much correspondence the last two months with many individuals.
In looking over my files, I find, to my horror, that I never
answered your wonderfully helpful letter of September 10, giving
me the information which I was so glad to have regarding the
history of Las Animas Hospital. I am very sorry indeed about
this oversight. I looked up your reference at once and found
that it was to be had in our Washington library. Rather than
bother you with the task of having it copied for me, and the
errands that that would necessitate, I was able to borrow it
from the Washington library and have had it copied here by
photostats. Without your help I would never have found this
reference, and I want to express again my sincere appreciation.
Should you ever run across any further histories or articles
on the hospital, I would be only too grateful if you would let
me know of them. I hope you are receiving the Mayo Clinic
Proceedings with my compliments. If they are not arriving,
by all means let me know.
